text: Ani ekhadya jivala, jyala marane allahane harama kele ahe, kadhihi avaidharitya maru naka (tyaci hatya karu naka) ani jo manusya niraparadha avastheta thara marala ja'ila tara amhi tyacya varasala hakka de'una thevala ahe. Parantu tyane (pratisodha mhanuna) thara maranyata gha'i karu naye. Nihsansaya tyaci madata keli geli ahe
